title: Why do I have another skin on sale with the regular ones? (Cyrocore Brand)
body: According to my client, Cyrocore Brand is for sale (along with the normal rotation [2 weeks for some reason]) and the "heist" rotation. I couldn't find this brand's skin on either sale? What could have happened?

replies.body: Well both are on sale for me as of now. Did restarting your client help?
My link explains why the Brand skin is on sale.
